issue.title: ErrorException in \yii\db\mysql\Schema::loadColumnSchema  on PHP 8.1

repository.name: yii2
repository.description: Yii 2: The Fast, Secure and Professional PHP Framework

issue.body:
```
2021-12-29 08:21:31 [-][-][-][error][yii\base\ErrorException:8192] yii\base\ErrorException: preg_match(): Passing null to parameter #2 ($subject) of type string is deprecated in /opt/site/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/db/mysql/Schema.php:297
Stack trace:
#0 [internal function]: yii\base\ErrorHandler->handleError(8192, 'preg_match(): P...', '/opt/site/vendo...', 297)
#1 /opt/site/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/db/mysql/Schema.php(297): preg_match('/^current_times...', NULL, Array)
#2 /opt/site/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/db/mysql/Schema.php(333): yii\db\mysql\Schema->loadColumnSchema(Array)
#3 /opt/site/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/db/mysql/Schema.php(125): yii\db\mysql\Schema->findColumns(Object(yii\db\TableSchema))
#4 /opt/site/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/db/Schema.php(758): yii\db\mysql\Schema->loadTableSchema('heat_substation...')
#5 /opt/site/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/db/Schema.php(194): yii\db\Schema->getTableMetadata('heat_substation...', 'schema', false)
#6 /opt/site/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/db/ActiveRecord.php(435): yii\db\Schema->getTableSchema('heat_substation...')
#7 /opt/site/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/db/ActiveRecord.php(509): yii\db\ActiveRecord::getTableSchema()
#8 /opt/site/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/db/ActiveQueryTrait.php(123): yii\db\ActiveRecord::populateRecord(Object(domain\chambers\activerecords\SubstationsGroupModeRelation), Array)
#9 /opt/site/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/db/ActiveQuery.php(219): yii\db\ActiveQuery->createModels(Array)
#10 /opt/site/vendor/yiisoft/yii2/db/ActiveQuery.php(306): yii\db\ActiveQuery->populate(Array)
```


to fix local add ` isset($info['default']))`
```php
 if (($column->type === 'timestamp' || $column->type === 'datetime' && isset($info['default']))
                && preg_match('/^current_timestamp(?:\(([0-9]*)\))?$/i', $info['default'], $matches)) {
                $column->defaultValue = new Expression('CURRENT_TIMESTAMP' . (!empty($matches[1]) ? '(' . $matches[1] . ')' : ''));
            } 
```

### Additional info

#19041

| Q                | A
| ---------------- | ---
| Yii version      | 2.0.?
| PHP version      |  8.1
| Operating system |

body: @samdark I checked and the issue persists. There has been no change to `framework/db/mysql/Schema.php line 296-297` yet to address the issue. see #19118, it contains a proposed fix.
